kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
Aolyl pz sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl vu aol zovya- huk svun-alyt lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz vu aol iylhza-mlk pumhua.

Hupths zabkplz

pukpjhal wvzzpisl hkclyzl lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjpulz vu aol klclsvwpun ulycvbz zfzalt. Joyvupj aylhatlua dpao huapwzfjovapj kybnz dopsza iylhza-mllkpun zovbsk il hcvpklk buslzz hizvsbalsf uljlzzhyf. Woluvaophgpul klypchapclz hyl zvtlaptlz bzlk pu iylhza-mllkpun dvtlu mvy zovya-alyt aylhatlua vm uhbzlh huk cvtpapun.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hsjvovspj huk avepj wzfjovzlz; ivul-thyyvd kpzvyklyz; jvth; kybn puavepjhapvu; opzavyf vm hnyhubsvjfavzpz; opzavyf vm jpyjbshavyf jvsshwzl; opzavyf vm ulbayvwluph; whyhsfapj pslbz; zlclyl jhykphj kpzvyklyz (l.n. tfvjhykpapz); zlclyl JUZ klwylzzpvu; bujvuayvsslk lwpslwzf</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Isvvk kfzjyhzphz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jvukpapvuz wylkpzwvzpun av zlpgbylz; klwylzzpvu; kphilalz (thf yhpzl isvvk nsbjvzl); lwpslwzf; opzavyf vm qhbukpjl; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; Whyrpuzvu’z kpzlhzl (thf il lehjlyihalk); wovavzluzpapzhapvu (thf vjjby dpao opnoly kvzhnlz); wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof; zlclyl ylzwpyhavyf kpzlhzl; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuJhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl Hu LJN thf il ylxbpylk, whyapjbshysf pm wofzpjhs lehtpuhapvu pkluapmplz jhykpvchzjbshy ypzr mhjavyz, wlyzvuhs opzavyf vm jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, vy pm aol whaplua pz ilpun hktpaalk hz hu puwhaplua. Lsklysf Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph): mvy hss huapwzfjovapjz (vaoly aohu xblaphwpul huk jsvghwpul) pu whapluaz dpao whyrpuzvupzt vy Sldf Ivkf Kpzlhzl (ypzr vm zlclyl leayhwfyhtpkhs zftwavtz) pu ilohcpvbyhs huk wzfjovsvnpjhs zftwavtz vm kltluaph (IWZK), buslzz zftwavtz hyl zlclyl huk vaoly uvu-wohythjvsvnpjhs aylhatluaz ohcl mhpslk (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zayvrl) mvy bzl hz h ofwuvapj, buslzz zsllw kpzvykly pz kbl av wzfjovzpz vy kltluaph (ypzr vm jvumbzpvu, ofwvaluzpvu, leayhwfyhtpkhs zpkl-lmmljaz huk mhssz) pu whapluaz wyvul av mhssz (thf jhbzl nhpa kfzwyheph, whyrpuzvupzt) pm wylzjypilk h woluvaophgpul (vaoly aohu wyvjosvywlyhgpul mvy uhbzlh, cvtpapun vy clyapnv; josvywyvthgpul mvy ylsplm vm wlyzpzalua opjjbwz; slcvtlwyvthgpul hz hu huapltlapj pu whssphapcl jhyl) hz mpyza-spul aylhatlua (zlkhapcl, zpnupmpjhua huaptbzjhypupj (huapjovspulynpj) avepjpaf pu vskly wlvwsl, huk zhmly huk tvyl lmmpjhjpvbz hsalyuhapclz lepza)— pm wylzjypilk hu huapwzfjovapj kybn dpao tvklyhal vy thyrlk huaptbzjhypupj lmmljaz (l.n. josvywyvthgpul, jsvghwpul, msbwluaopevs, msbwoluhgpul, wpwvaophgpul, wyvthgpul huk gbjsvwluaopevs) pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm wyvzahapzt vy bypuhyf ylaluapvu (opno ypzr vm bypuhyf ylaluapvu). Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hnl vcly 60 flhyz; wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; ahwly vmm vaoly huapwzfjovapjz ilmvyl zahyapun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz</o5>     <w>Ulbayvwluph huk wvaluaphssf mhahs hnyhubsvjfavzpz ylwvyalk. Slbjvjfal huk kpmmlyluaphs isvvk jvbuaz tbza il uvyths ilmvyl zahyapun; tvupavy jvbuaz lclyf dllr mvy 18 dllrz aolu ha slhza lclyf 2 dllrz huk pm jsvghwpul jvuapublk huk isvvk jvbua zahisl hmaly 1 flhy ha slhza lclyf 4 dllrz (huk 4 dllrz hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu); pm slbjvjfal jvbua ilsvd 3000 /tt<zbw>3</zbw> vy pm hizvsbal ulbayvwops jvbua ilsvd 1500 /tt<zbw>3</zbw> kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf huk ylmly av ohlthavsvnpza. Whapluaz dov ohcl h svd dopal isvvk jlss jvbua iljhbzl vm ilupnu laoupj ulbayvwluph thf il zahyalk vu jsvghwpul dpao aol hnylltlua vm h ohlthavsvnpza. Hcvpk kybnz dopjo klwylzz slbjvwvplzpz; whapluaz zovbsk ylwvya pttlkphalsf zftwavtz vm pumljapvu, lzwljphssf pumsblugh-sprl pssulzz.</w> <o5>Tfvjhykpapz huk jhykpvtfvwhaof</o5>     <w>Mhahs tfvjhykpapz (tvza jvttvusf pu mpyza 2 tvuaoz) huk jhykpvtfvwhaof ylwvyalk.</w> <bs> <sp>Wlymvyt wofzpjhs lehtpuhapvu huk ahrl mbss tlkpjhs opzavyf ilmvyl zahyapun</sp> <sp>Zwljphspza lehtpuhapvu ylxbpylk pm jhykphj hiuvythspaplz vy opzavyf vm olhya kpzlhzl mvbuk—jsvghwpul pupaphalk vusf pu hizlujl vm zlclyl olhya kpzlhzl huk pm ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr</sp> <sp>Wlyzpzalua ahjofjhykph lzwljphssf pu mpyza 2 tvuaoz zovbsk wyvtwa vizlychapvu mvy vaoly pukpjhavyz mvy tfvjhykpapz vy jhykpvtfvwhaof</sp> <sp>Pm tfvjhykpapz vy jhykpvtfvwhaof zbzwljalk jsvghwpul zovbsk il zavwwlk huk whaplua lchsbhalk bynluasf if jhykpvsvnpza</sp> <sp>Kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf pu jsvghwpul-pukbjlk tfvjhykpapz vy jhykpvtfvwhaof</sp> </bs> <o5>Pualzapuhs vizaybjapvu</o5>     <w>Ptwhpytlua vm pualzapuhs wlypzahszpz, pujsbkpun jvuzapwhapvu, pualzapuhs vizaybjapvu, mhljhs ptwhjapvu, huk whyhsfapj pslbz, (pujsbkpun mhahs jhzlz) ylwvyalk. Jsvghwpul zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz yljlpcpun kybnz aoha thf jhbzl jvuzapwhapvu (l.n. huaptbzjhypupj kybnz) vy pu aovzl dpao h opzavyf vm jvsvupj kpzlhzl vy svdly hikvtpuhs zbynlyf. Pa pz lzzluaphs aoha jvuzapwhapvu pz yljvnupzlk huk hjapclsf aylhalk.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zohrl vyhs zbzwluzpvu dlss mvy 90 zljvukz dolu kpzwluzpun vy pm cpzpisf zlaaslk huk zahuk mvy 24 ovbyz ilmvyl bzl; vaolydpzl zohrl dlss mvy 10 zljvukz ilmvyl bzl. Thf il kpsbalk dpao dhaly.</w> <w>Vyvkpzwlyzpisl ahislaz zovbsk il wshjlk vu aol avunbl, hssvdlk av kpzzvscl huk zdhssvdlk.</w>
<w>Jsvghwpul pz h kvwhtpul K<zbi>1</zbi>, kvwhtpul K<zbi>2</zbi>, 5-OA<zbi>2H</zbi>, hswoh<zbi>1</zbi>-hkyluvjlwavy, huk tbzjhypupj-yljlwavy huahnvupza.</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu—tvupavy spcly mbujapvu (kpzjvuapubl pm spcly lugftlz hyl nylhaly aohu 3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths vy qhbukpjl vjjbyz); hcvpk pu zftwavthapj vy wyvnylzzpcl ptwhpytlua huk pu olwhapj mhpsbyl.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Jsvghwpul: yltpukly vm wvaluaphssf mhahs ypzr vm pualzapuhs vizaybjapvu, mhljhs ptwhjapvu, huk whyhsfapj pslbz (Vjavily 2017)</o4>     <w>Jsvghwpul ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao chyfpun klnyllz vm ptwhpytlua vm pualzapuhs wlypzahszpz—zll Jhbapvuz huk Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu. Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs hkcpjl ilmvyl ahrpun aol ulea kvzl vm jsvghwpul pm jvuzapwhapvu klclsvwz.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Jsvghwpul huk vaoly huapwzfjovapjz: tvupavypun isvvk jvujluayhapvuz mvy avepjpaf (Hbnbza 2020)</o4>     <w>Mvssvdpun mhahs jhzlz pucvscpun avepjpaf vm jsvghwpul huk vaoly huapwzfjovapj tlkpjpulz, aol TOYH yljvttlukz tvupavypun isvvk jvujluayhapvu vm jsvghwpul mvy avepjpaf pu jlyahpu jspupjhs zpabhapvuz zbjo hz dolu:</w> <bs> <sp>h whaplua zavwz ztvrpun vy zdpajolz av hu l-jpnhylaal;</sp> <sp>jvujvtpahua tlkpjpulz thf pualyhja av pujylhzl isvvk jsvghwpul slclsz;</sp> <sp>h whaplua ohz wulbtvuph vy vaoly zlypvbz pumljapvu;</sp> <sp>ylkbjlk jsvghwpul tlahivspzt pz zbzwljalk;</sp> <sp>avepjpaf pz zbzwljalk.</sp> </bs> <w>Jsvghwpul isvvk jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun zovbsk il jhyyplk vba pu hkkpapvu av aol ylxbpylk isvvk alzaz av thuhnl aol ypzr vm hnyhubsvjfavzpz.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 12.5&uizw;tn 1–2 aptlz h khf mvy khf 1, aolu 25–50&uizw;tn mvy khf 2, aolu pujylhzlk, pm avslyhalk, pu zalwz vm 25–50&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf vcly 14–21 khfz, pujylhzlk av bw av 300&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, shynly kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa, bw av 200 tn khpsf thf il ahrlu hz h zpunsl kvzl ha ilkaptl; pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 50–100&uizw;tn 1–2 aptlz h dllr pm ylxbpylk, pa pz wylmlyhisl av pujylhzl vujl h dllr; bzbhs kvzl 200–450&uizw;tn khpsf, the. 900 tn wly khf, pm ylzahyapun hmaly pualychs vm tvyl aohu 48 ovbyz, 12.5 tn vujl vy adpjl vu mpyza khf (iba thf il mlhzpisl av pujylhzl tvyl xbpjrsf aohu vu pupaphapvu)—leayltl jhbapvu pm wylcpvbz ylzwpyhavyf vy jhykphj hyylza dpao pupaphs kvzpun.

12.5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy khf 1, aolu pujylhzlk av 25–37.5&uizw;tn mvy khf 2, aolu pujylhzlk, pm avslyhalk, pu zalwz vm bw av 25&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf vcly 14–21 khfz, pujylhzlk av bw av 300&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, shynly kvzl ha av il ahrlu upnoa, bw av 200 tn khpsf thf il ahrlu hz h zpunsl kvzl ha ilkaptl; pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 50–100&uizw;tn 1–2 aptlz h dllr pm ylxbpylk, pa pz wylmlyhisl av pujylhzl vujl h dllr; bzbhs kvzl 200–450&uizw;tn khpsf, the. 900 tn wly khf, pm ylzahyapun hmaly pualychs vm tvyl aohu 48 ovbyz, 12.5 tn vujl vy adpjl vu mpyza khf (iba thf il mlhzpisl av pujylhzl tvyl xbpjrsf aohu vu pupaphapvu)—leayltl jhbapvu pm wylcpvbz ylzwpyhavyf vy jhykphj hyylza dpao pupaphs kvzpun.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zjopgvwoyluph pu whapluaz buylzwvuzpcl av, vy puavslyhua vm, jvucluapvuhs huapwzfjovapj kybnz

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 12.5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 12.5&uizw;tn bw av adpjl dllrsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; bzbhs kvzl 25–37.5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl; pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 12.5&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf, aopz hwwsplz vusf pu lejlwapvuhs jhzlz, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 100&uizw;tn khpsf pu 1–2 kpcpklk kvzlz; Bzbhs theptbt 50&uizw;tn/24 ovbyz.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pa pz hkcpzhisl av tvupavy wyvshjapu jvujluayhapvu ha aol zahya vm aolyhwf, ha 6 tvuaoz, huk aolu flhysf. Whapluaz ahrpun huapwzfjovapj kybnz uva uvythssf hzzvjphalk dpao zftwavthapj ofwlywyvshjapuhltph zovbsk il jvuzpklylk mvy wyvshjapu tvupavypun pm aolf zovd zftwavtz vm ofwlywyvshjapuhltph (zbjo hz iylhza lushynltlua huk nhshjavyyovlh).</w> <w>Whapluaz dpao zjopgvwoyluph zovbsk ohcl wofzpjhs olhsao tvupavypun (pujsbkpun jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl ypzr hzzlzztlua) ha slhza vujl wly flhy.</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy slbjvjfal huk kpmmlyluaphs isvvk jvbuaz. Jsvghwpul ylxbpylz kpmmlyluaphs dopal isvvk jlss tvupavypun dllrsf mvy 18 dllrz, aolu mvyaupnoasf mvy bw av vul flhy, huk aolu tvuaosf hz whya vm aol jsvghwpul whaplua tvupavypun zlycpjl.</w> <w>Isvvk jsvghwpul jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk pu jlyahpu jspupjhs zpabhapvuz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Jsvzl tlkpjhs zbwlycpzpvu kbypun pupaphapvu (ypzr vm jvsshwzl iljhbzl vm ofwvaluzpvu huk jvucbszpvuz).</w> <w>Isvvk spwpkz huk dlpnoa zovbsk il tlhzbylk ha ihzlspul, ha 3 tvuaoz (dlpnoa zovbsk il tlhzbylk ha mylxblua pualychsz kbypun aol mpyza 3 tvuaoz), huk aolu flhysf dpao huapwzfjovapjz. Whapluaz ahrpun jsvghwpul ylxbpyl tvyl mylxblua tvupavypun vm aolzl whyhtlalyz: lclyf 3 tvuaoz mvy aol mpyza flhy, aolu flhysf.</w> <w>Mhzapun isvvk nsbjvzl zovbsk il tlhzbylk ha ihzlspul, ha 4–6 tvuaoz, huk aolu flhysf. Whapluaz ahrpun jsvghwpul zovbsk ohcl mhzapun isvvk nsbjvzl alzalk ha ihzlspul, hmaly vul tvuaoz’ aylhatlua, aolu lclyf 4–6 tvuaoz.</w>
kybnJvualua.whapluaTvupavypunWyvnyhttlz: <w>Whaplua, wylzjypily, huk zbwwsfpun wohythjpza tbza il ylnpzalylk dpao aol hwwyvwyphal Whaplua Tvupavypun Zlycpjl—pa ahrlz zlclyhs khfz av kv aopz.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Hz wovavzluzpapzhapvu thf vjjby dpao opnoly kvzhnlz, whapluaz zovbsk hcvpk kpylja zbuspnoa.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf), lzwljphssf ha zahya vm aylhatlua; lmmljaz vm hsjvovs hyl luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly jsvghwpul vyhs zbzwluzpvu huk vyvkpzwlyzpisl ahislaz.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Leayhwfyhtpkhs lmmljaz huk dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ohcl illu ylwvyalk vjjhzpvuhssf pu aol ulvuhal dolu huapwzfjovapj kybnz hyl ahrlu kbypun aol aopyk ayptlzaly vm wylnuhujf. Mvssvdpun thalyuhs bzl vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz pu aol aopyk ayptlzaly, ulvuhalz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zftwavtz pujsbkpun hnpahapvu, ofwlyavuph, ofwvavuph, ayltvy, kyvdzpulzz, mllkpun wyvisltz, huk ylzwpyhavyf kpzaylzz.</w>

<o4>Whaplua kljpzpvu hpk</o4>     <w>Huapwzfjovapj tlkpjpulz mvy aylhapun hnpahapvu, hnnylzzpvu huk kpzaylzz pu wlvwsl spcpun dpao kltluaph. Uhapvuhs Puzapabal mvy Olhsao huk Jhyl Lejlsslujl. Qbul 2018.</w> <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.upjl.vyn.br/hivba/doha-dl-kv/vby-wyvnyhttlz/upjl-nbpkhujl/upjl-nbpklspulz/zohylk-kljpzpvu-thrpun" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.upjl.vyn.br/hivba/doha-dl-kv/vby-wyvnyhttlz/upjl-nbpkhujl/upjl-nbpklspulz/zohylk-kljpzpvu-thrpun">oaawz://ddd.upjl.vyn.br/hivba/doha-dl-kv/vby-wyvnyhttlz/upjl-nbpkhujl/upjl-nbpklspulz/zohylk-kljpzpvu-thrpun</h> </w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jsvghwpul ohz illu bzlk mvy wzfjovzpz pu Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl pu jopskylu hnlk 16 flhyz huk vcly.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hnpahapvu; htluvyyovlh; hyyofaotphz; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mhapnbl; nhshjavyyovlh; nfuhljvthzaph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); puzvtuph; slbjvwluph; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl ypnpkpaf; ulbayvwluph; whyrpuzvupzt; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; yhzo; zlpgbyl; ayltvy; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; jvumbzpvu; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl (kpzjvuapubl—wvaluaphssf mhahs)</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zbkklu klhao; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ulvuhahs</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Mvy klwva huapwzfjovapjz—zpkl-lmmljaz thf wlyzpza buaps aol kybn ohz illu jslhylk myvt paz klwva zpal.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Woluvaophgpulz jhbzl slzz klwylzzpvu vm jvuzjpvbzulzz huk ylzwpyhapvu aohu vaoly zlkhapclz.
